title: Handle a General Customer Complaint
description: A retailer calls to complain about a rude delivery driver.

tasks.description: Receive the complaint from the retailer and log it in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new complaint case.

tasks.description: Apologize for the experience and assure the customer the issue will be investigated.
Forward the complaint to the logistics manager to address with the third-party freight carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: The complaint is sent to the appropriate internal party.
